_source.short_desc: Adverity is an industry-leading marketing data intelligence tool that enables companies to reduce complexity and make better decisions.
_source.long_desc:
Adverity is an industry-leading ETL
tool that enables companies to fully automate data integration from all data sources to create a single source of truth about your marketing and business performance.

Adverity is enabling data-driven marketers to make better decisions and improve performance across all campaigns and channels. Adverity makes it easy to identify opportunities to generate more revenue and demonstrate marketing ROI.

600+ Available Marketing Data Connectors!
_source.target_audience: Adverity helps marketers in agencies and brands to tackle their data challenges and create successful, data-driven campaigns that will deliver a high ROI.

category_features.name: Metadata Management
category_features.definition: Manage and track reference data of files (i.e. tags, title, comments, date of creation, file size, etc.)

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Visual Analytics
category_features.definition: Interact with data visualization elements, such as charts and graphs, to drill down into data

category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Management
category_features.definition: Enables users to optimize, secure, and manage large sets of data.

category_features.name: ETL
category_features.definition: Process of extracting, transforming, and loading data

category_features.name: Multiple Data Sources
category_features.definition: Allows users to manage data from a number of sources

category_features.name: Web Services
category_features.definition: Allows the integration of data between different web services

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

related_products.short_desc: Anypoint Platform is a leading integration platform for connecting on-premise, SaaS, and mobile systems.
related_products.features: With Anypoint Platform, organizations can better implement ETL/ ELT using the platform?s unique capabilities?from data transformation using DataWeave to polling and watermarking. In addition, Anypoint Platform?s comprehensive support for messaging, events, and streaming allows users to mix advanced integration patterns into ETL processing.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate Data Blind Spots That are Preventing You from Getting to Know Your Supporters by importing data fast.
related_products.features: Omatic Cloud Essentials can help you and your team efficiently handle the influx of gift and donor data while automatically identifying duplicate records, filter, review and merge them based on similarity scoring and importance. By automating importation from original source files to your Salesforce CRM the solution saves your organization time spent on administrative work. Omatic Cloud Essentials help you eliminate data blind spots that are preventing you from better knowing your supporters.

related_products.short_desc: Data transformation for cloud data warehouses. Transform your data into insights and decisions to outpace your competition.
related_products.features:
Matillion provides the only data transformation product purpose-built for cloud data warehouses. Our solution handles:
1) The extract and load of a business data into a CDW, providing the scale and performance needed to power data-driven analytics. 
2) The ability to join together a business varied data sources through our powerful transformation capabilities, completing the process to make data entirely analytics-ready.

related_products.short_desc: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data and integrate metrics where needed.
related_products.features: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data from popular advertising, social media, email, shopping, CRM, and other platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Microsoft Ads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, Amazon, Shopify, and more, then integrate the metrics they need into their favorite data destinations, including Google Data Studio, Google Analytics, Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Google BigQuery, and/or SQL.

related_products.short_desc: As a low-code ETL platform, Supermetrics integrates business data from 80+ sales & marketing platforms to your go-to analytics tools.
related_products.features:
As a low-code ETL platform, Supermetrics integrates business data into BigQuery, S3, Redshift, and other destinations in a fast and reliable way.

Supermetrics offers secure and easy-to-use data transfer and visualization features that help marketers and data professionals gain useful insights and make better decisions.

+700k marketers use Supermetrics in over 120 countries. Companies such as Nestle, Deloitte, and Pfizer already use Supermetrics to streamline their data.

related_products.short_desc: Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL needs.
related_products.features:
Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL Needs. It helps data teams streamline and automate org-wide data flows that result in a saving of ~10 hours of engineering time/week and 10x faster reporting, analytics, and decision making. 

The platform supports 150+ ready-to-use integrations across SaaS Applications, Databases, Cloud Storage, SDKs, and Streaming Services.

related_products.short_desc: Access, blend and analyze all types and sizes of data, empower users to visualize data across multiple dimensions.
related_products.features:
By tightly coupling data integration with business analytics, the Pentaho platform
from Hitachi Vantara brings together IT and business users to ingest, prepare, blend
and analyze all data that impacts business results. Pentahos open source heritage
drives continued innovation in a modern, unified, flexible analytics platform that
helps organizations accelerate their analytics data pipelines.

related_products.short_desc: Workato is a next-gen iPaaS with 1,000+ pre-built connectors to help automate the most complex workflows across your organization
related_products.features: Workato is the recognized Enterprise Automation Platform Leader. Workato empowers business and IT teams to integrate their apps and automate business workflows without compromising on security and governance. Built on a cloud-native architecture that is designed for scale and speed to significantly reduce operational footprint and overall costs. Our low-code/no-code platform enables teams to build integrations 5X faster than traditional platforms. Contact us for a free trial now!

related_products.short_desc: Enterprise-level complex data integration software, featuring a code-free, drag-and-drop interface.
related_products.features: Astera Centerprise offers a complete suite of data management solutions that includes data integration, data transformation, data quality, and data profiling, enabling users to handle multiple integration scenarios. We have been in business since 1995 and provide robust, affordable, and high-performance solutions to Fortune 1000 companies and enterprises, allowing them to overcome even the most complex data management challenges.

related_products.short_desc: Grooper provides data enrichment that embeds human comprehension into documents and other unstructured data.
related_products.features:
Grooper is an intelligent document processing and digital data integration solution that empowers organizations to extract meaningful information from paper/electronic documents and other forms of unstructured data. 
The platform combines patented and sophisticated image processing, capture technology, machine learning, natural language processing, and optical character recognition to enrich and embed human comprehension into data.

related_products.short_desc: Clean, organized marketing data, automatically loaded to your data warehouse of choice for a unified view of all your data.
related_products.features:
Capture all your marketing data and transfer automatically to your data warehouse without a single line of code. Singular empowers you with a plug-and-play marketing tool to create a single pipeline for all your data!
How?
Extract cost and marketing data from any source with flexible ingestion methods; clean, organize, and enrich that data; and automatically load that marketing data directly into your data warehouse for unified reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: Stitch rapidly moves data from 140+ sources into a data warehouse so you can get to answers faster, no coding required.
similar_products.features: Stitch is a powerful, yet simple ETL service just built for developers. Stitch connects to all data sources such as databases like MySQL and MongoDB. It also links to SaaS tools like Zendesk and Salesforce and replicates all relevant data to a data warehouse. Stitch can rapidly move data to analysts and other team members in a matter of minutes instead of weeks.

similar_products.short_desc: Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL needs.
similar_products.features:
Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL Needs. It helps data teams streamline and automate org-wide data flows that result in a saving of ~10 hours of engineering time/week and 10x faster reporting, analytics, and decision making. 

The platform supports 150+ ready-to-use integrations across SaaS Applications, Databases, Cloud Storage, SDKs, and Streaming Services.

similar_products.short_desc: Integrate.io is a data warehouse integration platform. We help you solve your data problems, so you can solve your problems with data.
similar_products.features:
Integrate.io is a Data Warehouse Integration Platform Designed for E-commerce. 

We help e-commerce companies build a customer 360 view, generate a single source of truth for data, improve customer insights through better operational insights, and increase advertising ROI.

We connect to all major e-Commerce providers such as Shopify, BigCommerce, and Magento. Allowing for the delivery of data to all major data warehouses and advertising platforms. 

Contact us for a free trial!

similar_products.short_desc: Flatirons Fuse is the easiest CSV and spreadsheet importer. Get your customers onboarded and your data imported within minutes.
similar_products.features:
Flatirons Fuse is an embeddable spreadsheet import tool that makes importing data to your website fast, easy, and painless.

With Flatirons Fuse your customers can upload their data in any structure, map their data to your own internal data schema, correct any issues with their data (as specified by your own system), and submit the data to your system.

similar_products.short_desc: Rivery is an ETL solution that adopts an ELT paradigm. This saves you valuable time and resources to focus more on data analysis.
similar_products.features: Rivery is the ETL platform for data-driven teams that want to supercharge  performance. With on-demand API support, Rivery can extract data from any source. Rivery flips the ETL paradigm on its head: the raw data is loaded directly into a target database. Data prepping, cleaning, and transformation are actually performed in the database itself, saving time and technical resources.

similar_products.short_desc: EasyMorph is a powerful, visual ETL tool with 100+ trasforms and actions. It's designed for users without a technical background.
similar_products.features: Powerful visual ETL tool designed specifically for users without a technical background. Offers 100+ actions and 120+ functions for easy data transformation, preparation, profiling and automation. Advanced workflows with parameters, loops, and conditional branching. Auto-generated documentation. Free time-unlimited edition.

similar_products.short_desc: No-code, any-to-any ETL platform that enables even non-technical users to send their data exactly where they need it.
similar_products.features:
Dataddo is a no-code ETL platform that enables you to connect any cloud service to any other cloud service, whether it's a dashboarding app, data warehouse, or a CRM tool.

Automate the time-consuming ETL process with Dataddo and spend more time using your data, not managing it. Our platform is designed with the non-technical business user in mind, meaning that anyone can set up a data flow within minutes of creating an account.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate data collection from over 500 sources and save hundreds of dev hours. Create a seamless data-flow to any destination you want.
similar_products.features: With integrations to over 500 sources out-of-the-box (plus additional sources upon request) Funnel collects, cleans and maps all of your marketing data, which can save you hundreds of dev hours.  Create a seamless flow to any destination you want, be it a BI tool, Data Warehouse, or simply Google Data Studios or Sheets.  Funnel adapts to any use case and is a success among technical and business people alike. Free trial available. |  Unlimited Users  Dynamic Pricing  Data Guarantee  |

similar_products.short_desc: Whether you receive invoices, purchase orders, claims, any other documents, Rossum automates your business communication.
similar_products.features:
Rossum is an AI-based cloud document gateway for automated business communication. Rossum solves four key steps in document-based processes at once: receiving documents across multiple channels, automated understanding, two-way communication to resolve exceptions, and acting on the data using in-depth integrations. 

ISO 27001 certified and HIPAA compliant, Rossum is trusted by: Pepsico, Veolia, Siemens, Cushman & Wakefield, and other companies that prefer to build rather than type.

similar_products.short_desc: MapForce is an any-to-any data mapping and ETL tool for graphically defining and executing ETL mappings for all popular data formats.
similar_products.features:
Altova MapForce is an any-to-any data mapping and ETL tool for graphically defining and executing  mappings for all popular data formats. 

MapForce supports mapping and transformation between any combination of XML, JSON, relational database, EDI, text, Excel, XBRL, Google Protobuf, and Web services data. 

MapForce is a highly affordable solution with flexible automation options.

similar_products.short_desc: Low code integration / ETL platform.   Features include deep ETL without code, audit/security, and amazingly fast integration.
similar_products.features:
LOW CODE INTEGRATION & STREAMING ETL.  You don't need to know how to code to get your data where you want it. Whether you are looking to get your data into Snowflake, Redshift, or even legacy systems and databases K3 is your low code sustainable solution.  Drop us a line for a demo or fjump into AWS for a free test drive.

-Large Adapter Library (connect to anything)
-Intuitive Mapping
-Data Rules Engine
-Cloud or On-Premise

similar_products.short_desc: Clean, organized marketing data, automatically loaded to your data warehouse of choice for a unified view of all your data.
similar_products.features:
Capture all your marketing data and transfer automatically to your data warehouse without a single line of code. Singular empowers you with a plug-and-play marketing tool to create a single pipeline for all your data!
How?
Extract cost and marketing data from any source with flexible ingestion methods; clean, organize, and enrich that data; and automatically load that marketing data directly into your data warehouse for unified reporting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Big Data software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Big Data tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Big Data software helps businesses and organizations analyze huge amounts of disparate data in one place. Unify your business information with Big Data software to uncover valuable insights, like buying trends and usage patterns. Big Data software is closely related to Business Intelligence software, Dashboard software, and Data Visualization software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Discovery software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Discovery tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Discovery software is used to identify, collect, and present data based on specific criteria.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Entry software eliminates tedious and labor-intensive manual data entry by providing tools for automatic data extraction, verification, and transfer into a system database. Data Entry software is an essential part of Forms Automation software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Extraction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Extraction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Extraction software allows organizations to collect information from websites, PDF files, and text files on local disks. The kind of information that can be extracted ranges from text to images and content summaries. Data Extraction software can often organize extracted data into a formatted Word document or an Excel table. For related solutions see Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Management software enables users to optimize, secure, and manage large sets of data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Mining software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Mining tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Mining software is used for examining large sets of data for the purpose of uncovering patterns and constructing predictive models. Data Mining techniques are extensively utilized in artificial intelligence applications and are the first step in machine learning processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Quality software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Quality tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Quality software helps organizations ensure accuracy of their data and consistency of its presentation. Common functionality includes automated verification of customer addresses, data deduplication, and data matching.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Database Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Management software stores data in a structured format so it can be easily managed and retrieved. These applications allow greater ability to manage, manipulate and combine disparate data from multiple non-relational sources. By combining an integrated, enterprise-wide data access point with the capability for extensive search, manipulation and reporting functions, Database Management solutions enable organizations to make better, broader and more efficient use of key data. Database Management software is related to Business Continuity software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Integration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Integration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Integration software allows separate applications to communicate and share data. Organizations use these applications to facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date company data. Integration solutions allow for the sharing of information and business functions across multiple applications and provide the user with a single point of access. Typically these applications also provide integrated reporting tools, allowing the synthesis of data from multiple applications and repositories. Integration software is related to Business Process Management software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Master Data Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Master Data Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Master Data Management software serves as a central repository for enterprise data collected from multiple sources, cleaned, verified, and organized in a way that helps link dispersed data points together.

_source.short_desc: Adverity is an industry-leading marketing data intelligence tool that enables companies to reduce complexity and make better decisions.
_source.long_desc:
Adverity is a flexible end-to-end Marketing Dashboards Platform enabling data-driven marketers to make better decisions and improve performance across all campaigns & channels. Adverity makes it easy to identify opportunities to generate more revenue & demonstrate marketing ROI.
 
Thanks to powerful automated data integrations, data visualizations and AI-powered predictive analytics, Adverity enables marketers to track performance in a single view & uncovers new insights in real-time.
_source.target_audience: Adverity helps marketers in agencies and brands to tackle their data challenges and create successful, data-driven campaigns that will deliver a high ROI.

category_features.name: Data Connectors

category_features.definition: Access, combine, transform, and store data without the help of an IT department

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
similar_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform for enterprises, agencies, and publishers. Datorama provides marketing intelligence solutions for all marketers and helps you bring together all of your marketing data into one dashboard view. Create compelling data-driven stories with Datorama dashboards, optimize your marketing campaigns, and make data-driven decisions faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Analytics platform to connect to all your data sources and build and distribute highly customizable dashboards and reports.

Connect to any data source and centralize all of your data in one place. Visualize, explore and distribute the data the way you need it. 

From highly customizable dashboards and reports to self-serve data exploration and client management, Klipfolio serves a broad range of analytics needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
